description:
Tsutomu is a 2nd year student at Todo Academy, and works as an Enforcer. He is very arrogant, frequently thinks he is stronger than he actually is. He is also very sadistic and perverted, seemingly having no moral code. To add to the list of less than desirable traits, Tsutomu is also very vindictive when crossed.
- wikipedia
name: Ryuuzaki Tsutomu
